word.item: I want to tell a story um about
mi mi wantem talem wan stori we hemi blo
once they were there then they wanted to make their garden
wan taem tufala i stap gogo tufala wantem mekem wan karen blo tufala
then they walked to the bush. They went then they went and saw a good place
nao tufala i wokbaot i go long bush. Tufala i go go go tufala i faenem wan gudfala ples
Then they cleared it, they cleared it and cleared it.
nao tufala i brasem tufala i brasem tufala i brasem gogo finis
Then they went home. They went home,
Afta nao tufala i kam lo haos. Tufala i kam lo haos,
then another day, another day they took their axes and went
nao lo narafala tei mo lo narafala tei tufala i karem akis nao tufala i go
the went and cut the trees down. They cut the trees down then that was done,
tufala i go katem ol tri oli foldaon. Tufala i katem ol tri oli foldaon gogo finis,
they cut it up short then what
tufala i katkatem i sot afta
the logs they cut the logs, these logs
ol pis hud i a we tufala i katkatem
then then they came and stayed in the house and they put it so that um what
afta finis tufala i kam stap lo haos mo tufala i putum i stap blo bambae
these logs did what they dried then they went and cooked they burned them
ol pisis bae oli trae afta bambae tufala i jes stap go bonem
then they stayed and stayed till on another day they went
nao tufala i stap tufala i stap gogo kasem lo neks tei tufala i go
tufala i go lo bus or karen
they went to the fence around, around their garden
tufala i go lo fenis hemi pas bihaen hemi pas bihaen lo karen blo tufala
they went to the bush then when that was done another day they went and um
tufala i go lo bus finis, afta lo neks tei tufala i go tufala i wanem ia
they burnt it they burnt their garden then when that was done then they came to the house, came and stayed
tufala i bonem tufal ai bonem karen blo tufala gogo finis afta tufala i kam lo haos tufala i kam stap
then another day they went back, they went, they went to the garden but their friends
nao long neks tei tufala i go bak bakagen tufala i go lo karen be ol fren blo tufala
manioc, sweet potato, banana and island cabbage, they carried it away
maniok, kumala, banana, wetem aelan kabij, tufala i karem i go
then they went and am they ate then when that was done they planted them, they planted them then, they planted the bus to this garden
afta tufala i go brekem hol blo graon gogo finis tufala i plan i plan i plan gogo tufala i planem flatem karen ia
then they went back to the house. they went and stayed
afta tufala i go bakagen lo haos tufala i go stap
they stayed and stayed then after a bit of a long time then he said that let's go now and see how our garden is
tufala i stap tufala i stap gogo long taem lelebet afta i talem lo hem se yumi traem go jekem karen blo yumi tu se i olsem wanem
maybe things will have grown or died, then they went
ating ol ting i gro o i tet nao tufala i go
they went then to the garden
tufala i go gogo lo karen
they looked at the garden like this and
tufala i lukluk i go lo karen olsem ia be
they saw that their things here were growing very well
tufala i luk we ol ting blo tufala ia oli gro i gud we i gud
but um the grass had grown already too
be a ol kras tu oli gro finis
they went and weeded, they weeded clear um
tufala i go wit witim klinim a
they weeded clean these thingsof theirs then
tufala i wit klinim ol kakae blo tufala ia gogo
they finished the garden then they went
tufala i wit flatem karen finis tufala i go
went back to the house, went and stayed and stayed and stayed and then they knew that this food would um
go bak lo haos tufala i stap i stap i stap i stap gogo tufala i save se ol kakae ia oli
it's ready already then one day they said what
i redi ia nao nao lo wan tei tufala i talem se
let's go and see um our garden maybe the food will be ready already now
yumi tu traem go jekem a karen blo yumi tu ating ol kake blo yumi tu oli redi nao
it's ready they they went, it was still morning they went
i redi finis ia nao tufala i go lo eali moning yet tufala i go
they went then the garden like this and
tufala i go gogo lo karem olsem ia be
they heard pigs that were in the garden then they looked and they saw them
tufala i harem noes blo ol pig we oli stap lo karen nao taem tufal ai lukluk i go be tufala i luk olgeta
so they just broke through the fence they they went inside they went into this garden
nao oli brekem vens ia nomo afta oli insaet oli go lo karen ia
they went and stayed they were eating in this food
oli go stap oli stap kakae ol kakae ia
the crab said rat you cover up the hole here and I'll go chase the pigs, when one comes like this you grab it
krab i talem se rat yu yu blokem hol ia ia be bae mi mi go ronem ol pig sipos we wan i kam olsem ia be bae yu holem
g c i b u c
nao rat i talem se okay i stret
then the rat went and blocked um what the hole here and he um the crab went and chased um the pigs
afta nao rat i go blokem a hol i stap afta krab nao i go ronem ol pig
when one came he was scared, then he ran a long way away and
taem hemia we i kam be hemi fraet lo hem afta i ron i go stap longwe
um what the fence um what the pig came and passed and passed um the space at once yes and went and came out
wanem ia fense wanem ia pig i kam i pas i pas lo spes ia wantaem i go kamaot
he chased once the crab cahsed another one he came and the rat was making it like this
i ronem krab i ronem narawan i kam be rat i stap mekem olsem ia nomo
then the crab said, hey what are doing now?
nao krab i talem se hey yu stap mekem olsem wanem ia
can't you hold one?" "No, I'm scared.'"
yu no save holem wan" "e no mi fraet."
there was just one left now but the crab said 'okay'
i kat wan nomo ia nao i stap ia afta krab i talem se i oraet
I'll just go cover um um the hole here and you come chase um what the pig will come
bae mi nao mi go blokem hol ia ya be bae yu yu kam go ronem a pig i kam
the crab um the crab came it covered um um the hole that was here and he stayed at the fence now and he
nao krab i kam i blokem a hol ia we i stap lo fens ia afta
then the rat went and chased the pig over
rat nao i go ronem pig i kam
when it came came near like this and the crab caught it, it caught um this pig then
taem we i kam kam klosap olsem ia be krab i holem i holem pig ia afta
he did what he said to the rat he said 'go cut the rope and um what
nao hemi talem lo rat i talem se yu go katem rop mo bae wanem ia
so go cut the rope over here! then the rat the went and cut the rope over
i talem se yu go katem rop i kam nao rat i go rop i kam
then they came and tied up the two legs and the two hands, when that was done they went and cut um some wood
nao tufala i kam tufala i tufala lek blo hem wetem tufala han blo hem gogo finis i go go katem a hud
then he carried it over that came and put the rope under this pig, they carried it to the house
afta i karem i kam i kam putum i go lo rop antanit lo pig ia afta tufala i karem i go lo haos
it went on then they put it in their house
tufala i go putum i stap lo haos blo tufala afta
and they didn't have a knife, a small one for slicing the pig with so
be tufala i no gat smol naef we bambae tufala i save katem pig lo hem nao
they went to an old woman, they went and asked her they said can you give us um what
tufala i go luk wan olfala woman tufala i go askem tufala i talem lo hem se yu savi kivim a wanem ia
your small knife to do something, we'll go slice something of ours with it
smol naef blo yu i kam bae mitufala i go katem wan samtin blo mitufala long hem
but the old woman said, you'll go slice what?
be olfala woman i talem se bae yutufala go katem wanem?
bae yutufala i go katem wanem wantaem?
but the two of them said
no we'll just slice something of ours with it
no bae mitufala i go katem wan samting blo mitufala nomo lo hem
no bae yutufala i mas talemaot
you'll say what it is you're going to slice with this knife
bae yutufala i mas talem wanem nao bambae yutufala i go katem lo naef ia
if you don't say I won't give my knife to you so
sipos we yutufala i no talemaot bae mi no savi kivim naef blo mi lo yutufala afta
they two of them spoke a while they went and just let it be okay, we'll just tell her
tufala i stap talem gogo tufala i go letem se i oraet bae yumitu talem lo hem nomo
then they said to her they said
nao tufala i talem lo hem tufala i talem se
we want to take your knife
mitufala i wantem karem naef blo yu
to go slice um a pig um a pig
bae mitufala i go katem wan pig a wan pig
we'll go slice the pig then she said, the old woman said
mitufala i go katem pig nao hemi talem se olfala woman i talem se
no you can't slice it, slice it properly
no yutufala i no savi katem katem gud
Me at once it will be with us so that I'll go, I yes, I'll go slice it and I'll slice it properly
mi wantaem bae mi kam wetem yutufala, blo bambae yumi go be bae mi nao bae mi katem mo bambae mi save katem gud
they went, they went and held the um pig here and
oli go tufala i holem taet pig ia be
the old woman did what, she sliced it, she stuck it dead then she cut it
olfala woman ia i katem i stikim i ded afta i katem
she cut it up then when that was done they went and made a fire in the hole, they put stones in it then when that was done
i katkatem gogo finis tufala i go mekem faea lo hol tufala i go sakem ston i go lo hem finis
The fire was burning then the two of them um they took um this pork, they went and put it inside, the fire was burning
faea i stap laet gogo tufala i karem ol pig ia i go sakem i go lo hem faea i stap laet
they cleaned it and cleaned it then they finished cleaning these pigs
tufala i klinim tufala i klinim gogo tufala i klinim flatem a everi pig ia
then they took out the stones to their place then they took leaves then they came and put it
afta tufala i stikimaot ston i kam lo saet afta tufala i karem lif i kam kam sakem
they put the laplap leaves in the hole then when that was done they put the pig into it
tufala i stretem lif laplap lo hol gogo finis tufala i sakem pig i go lo hem
then they did what they covered it up there
afta tufala i kavaramap i go stap
then they covered it up, they covered it with different leaves again then when that was done then they um
afta tufala i kavaramap tufala i kavaramap lo ol defdefren lif bakagean gogo finis afta tufala i
they dug the ground, they um they buried it, they put it on these leaves, they buried it
tufala i tikim graon tufala i perem tufala i sakem kavaramap ol lif ia lo hem tufala i perem.
they buried it then it stayed and they went to the house, the old woman went back to her house
tufala i perem i stap i stap afta tufala i go lo haos olfala woman tu i go bak lo haos blo hem bakagen
then they stayed a while, they went to the house then
afta tufala i stap gogo nao tufala i go lo haos
they said hey, um the rat said, hey how about we go swim in the sea
tufala i talem se hei a rat i talem se hei bae i olsem wanem bae yumitu go swim smol lo solwota
let's go swim in the sea then
bae yumitu go swim smol lo solwota
then the crab said okay let's go
afta nao krab i talem se okei i oraet yumitu go
then they went, they went and swam then when that was over they came back to the house
nao tufala i go tufala i go swim swim swim gogo finis tufala i tanem raon i kam bak lo haos
let's go first to the try um what the food that we um we covered up over there
yumitu traem go jekem wanem ia kakae ia we yumitu kavaramap i go stap ia
they go dig the ground they take the ground out then when that's done they take out the leaves
tufala i go tikim graon tufala i karemaot graon i kam go gogo finis tufal ai karkaremaot lif
they take out the stones, the stones are done too and they're taking out um what
tufala i karkaremaot ol ston ston gogo finis nao tufala i stap karemaot wanem ia
the leaves went like this and they smelt it.
ol lif laplap wetem ol lif i go olsem ia be tufala i smelem
ooh the smell of our pig is really good
o tru smel blo pig blo yumitu i gud we i gud
then they're um they're looking um they take the leaves off
afta tufala i stap openem mo tufala i karem ol lif i go
it went on they took out the leaves like this and wah!
i go gogo tufala i karemaot lif blo laplap olsem ia be
there was no pig the leaves were already gone from the hole, someone had taken them
pig i no gat ol lif tu oli no gat finis lo hol wan man i kam karem
then had a poo. Maybe the old woman and this old woman had done what she'd take out the pork then she pooed in
afta hemi sisit ating olfala woman ia olfala woman wataem ia i karemaot ol pig ia afta i sisit i go lo a
into um this hole, then she covered it up, they saw it was like this now
i go lo hol ia finis afta i kavaramap tufala i luk olsem ia
they knew straightaway that they said this old woman came and took our pig
tufala i save wantaem se olfala woman ia wantaem ia we i kam kareamoat pig blo yumitu ia
then they went and saw her they said, hey, old woman, who was it who came and took our pork? You?
nao tufala i go go luk hem tufala i talem se hei olfala woman huia i kam kareamot a pig blo mitufala yu
Was it you who took it?
if you took it then say
sipos we yu karemaot bae yu talem
aa no mi mi no save
I didn't see someone go and dig
mi no luk wan man we bae i kam tikim
no we know it was just you
no mitufala save se yu nomo
it was just you who took it out now
yu nomo ia yu karemaot ia
but the old woman lied again then they came back
be olfala woman i kiaman olfala woman i kiaman nao tufal ai tanemraon i kam bak
so they said hey what should we do? the crab said
nao tufala i talem se hei bae yumitu mekem olsem wanem nao mm krap i talem se
let's sing, let's sing and what um a wave will come then it'll come take out this old woman with um this food away
bae yumitu singsing yumitu singsing afta bae weiv i kam nao bae i kam karemaot olfala woman ia wetem a kakae ia i go
the rat said okay then let's sing
rat i talem se i gud nomo ale bae yumitu singsing
they said when the wave comes then it will hit and carry off her then us
tufala i talem se sipos a weiv i kam ia bae i kilim hem bae i karem hem ia be bae yumitu
you rat you climb on top of the pine branch and the crab said I'll go in the hole, I'll go in my hole
yu rat yu klaem yu go stap lo brans blo ok tri antap be krap i talem se bae mi go insaet lo hol bae mi go insaet lo hol blo mi
ale tufala i singsing tufala i singsing nao tufala i singsing we tufala i singsing
they sang a wave, saying the wave would come, would come take off um carry, take the old woman here away
tufala i singsing lo weiv tufal ai talem se weiv bae i kam kam kareamaot a i karem karem olfala woman ia i go
then they sang then singing like this, praying like this
nao tufala i singsing nao singsing blo hem olsem singsing blo hem olsem
singsing - old language ol weiv oli kam lo wan ples mo oli bigwan, oli bigwan,
SINGING, then they went ahead and sang
sing sing: weive oli kam big olsem rut blo naktambol / nao i go tufala i gohet tufala singsing
the wave didn't come yet, SINGING
weiv i no kam yet sing sing: weiv oli kam o wan ples mo oli bigwan
oli bigwan oli kam big olsem rut blo nakatambol
they looked but the wave was passing a long way away, it was coming then they sang
tufala i singsing be weiv i stap pas longwe mo i stap kam nao tufal ai stap singsing
weiv oli kam lo wan ples mo oli bigwan oli bigwan
SINGING, the wave was coming the two of them carried on
weiv oli kam big olsem rut blo nakatambol / weiv i stap kam tufala i gohet
weiv oli kam lo wan ples mo oli bigwan
oli bigwan weiv oli kam big olsem rut blo nakatambol
the wave got big it came now, the rat climbed up into the pine tree and the crab went into his hole
weiv i kam i bigwan i kam ia rat i klaem i go antap lo a stamba blo ok tri be krab i go insaet lo hol blo hem
the wave came here it went to the shore like this now
weiv i kam ia i go i go lo so olsem ia
it went and broke at once on the house and the village, it took out um this old woman in her house
weiv i go ia i brok wantaem lo haus mo lo vilij i karemaot olfala woman lo haos blo hem
and the two of them came out, the came and say each other so um this story just finishes here
nao tufala i kam kamaot tufala i kam luk tufala nao a storian ia i go finis lo ples ia
Yufala i kam kam ia yufala i kam yufala i kam ia
Come out come out then stay near here.
yufala i kam ia yufala i kam ia yufala i kam stap klosap lo ples ia
yes, she wants she wants to learn the language that we are speaking, understand?
a yu luk hemia i wantem stap karem toktok blo yumi ia yu save?
yes, this one wants to know our language.
a yes hemia i wantem karem toktok blo yumi
So I told you to come here for mi to speak so that you listen
hemia nao mi talem se yufala i kam stap klosap mo bae mi mi toktok blo bambae yufala i harem
right, what, so this woman here too, she will hear so that she understand us in order to be understanding now
mo mania woman ia tu bambae hemi harem hemia nao i stap karem a samting ia
Yes aren't you going to go sleep?
bambae yufala no go silip yet?
No they want to not sleep
Okay don't touch that anymore don't touch that pipe
Okay yu nomo tajem samting ia yu no tajem paep ia
Stay and listen carefully, if you want to go sleep then go and sleep
yufala i stap yufala i lesin gud taem mi talem se yufala i go silip bae yufala i go slip
You want to go sleep now (possible example of ha used as described by Parker)
ok bae naoia olsem wanem yufala i watem go silip nao
yufala i talem! Yes. aa i gud.
I want to tell a story about laplap.
Mi wantem talem story blo laplap.
Laplap, when they want to make it,
Laplap, taem we oli wantem mekem,
They get the food, they go and get it ready then they peel it. They finish peeling
Oli karem kakae blong hem, oli go sakem, finis oli katem; oli katem finis
Then they clean it, they bring some water and put it in a dish. When they've washed it
Afta oli wasem, oli kasem wota i kam go lo dis, oli wasem; oli wasem gogo finis,
Then they take it and they scrape it; scrape, scrape, it's done,
Afta oli karem oli rasrasem; oli rasrasem rasrasem gogo finis,
they turn it over, turn it over, turn it over, keep turning it over until it's soft. Then
oli tantanem oli tantanem oli tantanem oli tantanem gogo i sopsop. Afta
They put leaves on and on then it's done, then the ropes then it's done.
Oli putum lif, oli putum lif gogo finis afta rop gogo finis.
They cover it with long leaves, and then,
Oli putum lif laplap gogo finis,
The go and milk it they squeeze milk over it.
They squeeze, squeeze, squeeze then when it's done, they put the food on the leaf.
Oli melekem, oli melekem, oli melekem koko finis, oli sakem kakae i go lo lif ia.
When they've put it away they flatten it, they flatten it and then when it's done they cover it, cover it, cover it up.
Oli sakem lo hem finis; oli levelem, oli levelem gogo finis; oli kavaramap kavaramap kavaramap.
They cover it, cover it and then,
Oli kavaramap, oli kavaramap gogo finis,
They um, take the spine of the leaf and they tie it, they tie it.
Nao oli karem purau, oli fasem.
They tie it up and then,
then they make the fire to heat the stone; and then they pick up the stones, when the stones are hot they pick them up.
afta oli mekem faea faea i hot ston; afta oli stikim ston, ston i hot fnis oli stikim.
They cover it; When they've covered it they wait, wait, wait until they know that
Oli kavaramap; oli kavaramap finis go stap, stap, stap gogo oli save se
it's ready then they open it um
This food; they open it, open it and then they take it out; they bring it to a place that's good,
kakae ia; oli openem, oli openem gogo finis afta oli karemaot; oli karem ikam lo gudfala ples,
The open it there and they slice it; people eat it.
Oli openem afta oli katem; ol man oli kakae.
When we stay we stay until the sea is dry,
taem we mifala mifala stap gogo solwota i trae
then we wanted to go to the sea to go look for um, we go when the tide is out, we go to the reef.
afta mifala i watem go lo solwota; mifala i go lukaotem aa... mifala i go, solwota i trae, mifala i go lo reef.
We go to reef, we go to look for, um, fish on the reef; we get shellfish; we catch fish; we get squid.
Mifala i go lo reef, go lukaotem a fish lo reef; mifala i karem sel; mifala i kilim ol fish; mifala i karem nawita.
We get them and then we take them back to shore.
Mifala i karem gogo finis afta mifala i karem i kam lo so.
The sea comes in then we come to shore; we bring all the things to the house and we get them ready.
Solwata i kam mo mifala i kam so; mifala i kam karem ol samting ia i kam long haos, mifala i mekem i tan.
We eat it all up and we stay; that's the end here.
mifala i kakae gogo finis nao mifala i stap; so ating hemia i finis nao.
are hanging around then George comes and tells us
stap wokabaot gogo George ikam talem long mifala
ol boe oli agri i oraet.
We stay until night and go to sleep.
mifala stap gogo naet go silip
We get up in the morning and all the boys come together with George, they make
mifala wekap lo moning evri boe oli kam tugeta wetem George oli mekem
plans. We go to the garden, we go clear George's.
Plan mifala go lo garen mifala go bras blo George.
Sometimes we start with a prayer beforehand, sometimes we just go and clear the land.
Samtaem mifala i openem wetem pre o samtaem mifala i go bras nomo.
We clear land until it's done.
mifala i go bras gogo finis
mifala i kam mo stap stori
The boys laugh we cook and finish eating then come to the house.
ol boe oli lav mifala i rus kakae gogo finis mifala i kam lo haos
We come to the house, we get our shoes, we get our football boots, we go to the field
mifala kam kasem haos. mifala i karem sus blo mifala, karem sus blong futbol mifala go lo fil
We play until we're done, we come back, George calls us, we go, go eat our dinner.
mifala i ple gogo finis mifala i kambak George i singaotem mifala i go go kakae lo naet
Then some of them who drink kava go and drink kava.
mo olgeta we oli dring kava oli go dring kava .
Those who drink kava go and drink kava.
olgeta we oli dring kava oli go dring kava.
and those of us who don't drink it, we finish eating, then chat until we go and sleep.
be mifala we i no dring mifala i kakae finis afta stori afta gogo finis mifala go silip.
George comes and tells us to go weeding in his garden.
George i kam talem se ba mifala i go wit lo garen blo hem.
And we go then we plant his manioc.
mifala go planem manioc blo hem
we finish praying then we work we just go work
mifala pre finis mifala go wok o samtaem mifala go wok nomo
mifala no pre mifala i planem
then it's done we go make a fire then cook then food then sit down and chat.
gogo finis mifala go mekem faea mifala rus mifala i kakae mifala i sidaon mifala stori.
It continues til afternoon, we come home.
stap gogo kasem aftanun mifala i kam lo haos
we come we take our boots we go again then play football, it's done
mifala i kam karem ol sus blo mifala mifala i go bakagen mifala i futbol
we come George calls us we go again go eat.
mifala i kam George i singaoatem mifala bakagen mifala i go kakae
we eat then it's done, we go, it's dawn, it's dawning, we go
mifala i kakae gogo finis mifala i go wanwan telit i stap de i stap go
In George's garden the grass is growing, he comes and tells us to go.
garen blo George kras gro i kam talem lo mifala mifala i go
We go and pull up grass and pull up grass then his food grows good and tall
mifala go pulum kras pulum kras afta kakae blo hemi gro gud i go antap
it goes until it becomes good and ripe
i go gogo i go redy gud
George goes goes to cut his manioc.
George i go katem manioc blong hem.
his food we take, cut the food, put it inside a bag and take it to the house
kakae blo hem i pulum i katem kakae i fulumap i go lo bak mo i karem i kam lo haos
maybe when you want something like
taem we i wantem wan samting olsem
shirt or shoes for football or something that you want to buy, make laplap
shirt o sus blo hem blo futbol o wan samting we i wantem pem i mekem laplap
sell it, people will buy their laplap
i salem ol man oli pem laplap blo hem
They take his money, they take this money.[what is the mi doing?]
hemi karem mani ia i karem mani ia
they go to buy something they want
hemi go pem samting we hemi wantem
they come, come put it safe or use it; it's finished now.
i kam kam i sakem i stap o i usum afta i finis nao
I buy green kava, one kilo costs 200 vatu
mi stap peem grin kava, 1 kilo hemi 200
When I'm done weighing them then I put them into water.
mi skelem finis afta mi sakem i go long wota
I clean them, that's done and break it into pieces
mi kilinem finis afta mi katem i pispis
it goes in the water again
then it stays, I take it out to go on top and the kava goes in the sun
afta mi takemaot i go long kava mo ko long san
Then it stays, the sun will burn it dry, wait a bit,
afta san bonem i trae afta

word.item: to make some food with meat / no say 'kovi' for it / meat,
yu mekem wan kakae wetem mi / no a mit blo hem / mit,
you kill a pig; you come and skin it.
yu kilim pig afta yu kam skinim.
Then, you cut it up then,
you come and slice it up,
you cut it up / you make us two flatten it over there / no
yu katkatem / yu mekem mitufala i steretem finis ia lowe / no
you make it, you stick it on a broom; you come and um,
i mekem yu stikim lo brum yu kam yu kam,
you put it on the fire; then you eat it.
mekem i stap lo faea afta yu kakae.
there was a man; they went and stayed in their nakamal until...
wan man; oli go stap lo nakamal blo olgeta gogo...
it got dark; he took this boy of his to the nakamal.
ples i tudak; hemi karem boe blo hem nomo tufala i go stap lo nakamal.
They kept on chatting in the nakamal until... his boy fell asleep.
Oli stap stap oli stori lo nakamal gogo... boe blo hem i slip.
He put his boy to sleep in the bowl, the breadfruit bowl; they kept on talking until...
Hemi putum boe blo hem i stap lo hud hud blo bredfrut; oli stap stap oli stori koko..
They got up and he forgot his boy behind; he went off home,
oli kerap hemi fogetem boe blo hem i stap; hemi go kasem haos,
he went to sleep and the remembered his boy; "hey, I took a boy of mine with me;" he thought about him and ran back to the nakamal,
hemi kam silip, be i tingbaot boe blo hem; "ee mi mi bin karem wan boe blo mi i kam wetem mi;" hemi tingbaot nao i ron bakagen i go lo nakamel,
He went, he didn't see his boy in the bowl.
Hemi go be i no luk boe blo hem lo hud ia.
He turned back and told his mother,
Hemi tanemraon mo i go bak i talem lo mami blo hem,
"Where is the boy? I went to look and I didn't see him; come look for him!"
"boe ia i stap wea? Mi go lukaotem mi luk yu kam yumitu go lukaotem
They went and started following the creek.
‎‎Tufala i go tufala i stat folfolem reva.
They went and looked and looked everywhere; they didn't see him.
Tufala i go lukaotem lukaotem lo evri ples be tufala i no luk hem.
They went under a creek; they said "maybe that man the devil maybe he carried him off"; they went under the creek,
Tufala i go tufala i go lo wan smol reva; tufala i talem se "ating man ia devel ating i karem man ia"; tufala i go tufala i go lo smol reva,
this thing he, the devil carried this boy in the silo; they went along the creek; they just went, it wasn't long before
man ia a devel i karem boe ia i stap lo hud blo kilim bredfrut lo hem; tufala i go folfolem reva i go; hemi jas go, hemi go i no longtaem,
um what, a thing, we call it, we call it um 'hodarang'; 'hodarang' is a kind of water devil that lives in the creek that hangs around here.
wanem ia, wan samting, yumi talem, mifala i talem a hondarang hondarang hemi olsem reva ia we i hang lo ples ia.
It made it so um, he was surprised, the devil was right by um this water devil.
i mekem, hemi go i seksek, devel ia i go i stret lo a devel blo wota ia.
and then he pulled out, he swallowed down the boy at once out of the bowl.
i pulum i pulumaot i soelem daon boe ia wantaem lo hud ia.
This thing was only carrying off this empty bowl.
Man ia i stap karem hud nating ia nomo i go
He went along and got to his place; he said "today I've already brought my food here;" he looked into the bowl and the boy was gone, the water devil had already swallowed the boy.
I go go go go stap lo ples blo hem; mo i talem se "tetei kakae blo mi mi karem finis mi kam;" taem we i lukluk i go lo hud be boe ia i nogat; boe ia handarang i soelem daon.
He was singing a song when the devil swallowed him; the song he sang went like this,
hemi stap singsing lo wan singsing wantaem devel i soelem doan singsing we i stap singsing lo hemi talem se,
b u d i b g
"The water devil was at ?, it was at ? ?" He was singing this song,
"Wota devel i stap lo ?, hemi stap lo ? ?" Hemi stap singsing singsing ia,
and his Dad and Mum were hearing it, he was singing and he sang; they were hearing his voice and following it; they went and he sang again,
be papa blo hem tufala i stap harem hemi stap singsing nao hemi singsing tufala i stap harem voes blo hem mo tufala i stap folem tufala i go be hemi singsing bakagen
"The water devil was at ?; he was at ? ? "
"Wota devel i stap lo ?; hemi stap lo ? ?"
They were going and they were hearing
Tufala i stap go tufala i stap harem
um, their boy's voice; they went on and on... they went right up to this thing.
a, voes blo boe blo tufala tufala i go tufala i go tufala i go gogo go tufala i go stap stret lo samting ia.
He sang again one more time; they looked up and saw the water devil that had swallowed the boy; he said to him,
Hemi stap singsing bakagen; taem tufala i lukluk i go antap tufala i luk devel ia we i soelem daon boe ia; nao hemi talem lo hem se
"yu traut lo boe blo mi i kam!"
Wan taem nomo samting ia i,
he vomited out his boy; they came and hugged him and turned around and went back.
i traut lo boe blo hemi kamaot tufal ai kam holem hem nao tufala i tanemraon i go bak.
They went home; the day dawned; they said "Our boy was lost.
tufala i go go kamaot lo haos; ples i telaet; tufala i talem se "boe blo mitufala i bin lus.
But we went and followed him; there was a water devil, but this song meant we found our boy."
Be mitufala i go folem; wan tevel nao singsing ia i mekem se mitufala i faenem boe blo mitufala."
Then they made um, a big fire, for their boy who had been lost.
Nao tufala i mekem wan bigfala faea from boe blo tufala we i bin lus.
My name is Philomen; me my job is, is a tour guide.
Nem blo mi huia Philomen; mi wok blo mi hemi tour guide.
Chief tour guide from Endu, the east part of um what, the island of um, Ambrym.
jip tour guide blo Endu East part blo aelan blo Ambrym.
And I like my work but it's a lot, a lot.
A wok blo mi mi laekem hem be hemi bigwan we hemi big wan.
First of all when a tourist says they're going to land at the airport,
Fastaem taem we turis says they'll foldaon lo eapot,
I go and I, I stand up to
mi mi go mi stanap blo
take them out of what, the tourists out of the airport; I take them carefully; I take them to
mi karemaot huia turis lo eapot mi karem gud hem mi karem i go lo

yes, it gets to the time that we um, we get up.
yes, i go kasem taem we mitufala i kam mitufala i girap.

mo hemi wan gudfala fasin we hemi gud we hemi gud mo rod ia a yes rod ia we naoia ol man oli stap hemi yes hemi rod blo pig.

olsem se hemi wan ples we oli no bin luk fastaem bifo olsem.

afta taem we mitufala i folem afta mi talemaot lo hem se ples ia wokbaot blo hem hemi olsem ia.
